西端: (せいたん) - western edge (e.g. of city); west side
西縁: (せいえん) - western edge; west margin

西遊: (さいゆう) - westward trip; trip to the West

西遼: (せいりょう) - Western Liao (Central Asian Khitan empire, 1132-1211 CE)
西部: (せいぶ) - western part; the west (of a region); the West (i.e. of the US)
西部インド洋: (せいぶインドよう) - Western Indian Ocean

西陣織り: (にしじんおり) - Nishijin silk fabrics; Nishijin brocade

西黒丸烏: (ニシコクマルガラス) - Eurasian jackdaw (Corvus monedula)
要: (você/kaname/eu) - need , pivot; vital point, cornerstone, keystone; Japanese photinia
要す: (ようす) - to need; to require; to take; to demand
要する: (ようする) - to need; to demand; to take; to require
要するに: (ようするに) - in a word; after all; the point is ...; in short ...; to put simply; the long and short of it is that ....
要は: (ようは) - in short; the point is
要らざる御世話: (いらざるおせわ) - That's none of your business
要らん: (いらん) - I don't need it; I don't want it
要りよう: (いりよう) - (usu. 入り用) need/demand/necessity; costs/expenses
要り用: (いりよう) - (usu. 入り用) need/demand/necessity; costs/expenses
要る物: (いるもの) - thing (someone) needs or wants
要を得る: (ようをえる) - to be to the point
要予約: (ようよやく) - reservation required; prior booking essential
要事: (ようじ) - important matter; necessary thing; requirement
要介護: (ようかいご) - primary nursing care; nursing care level (with number between 1 and 5 based on assessed care needs)
要介護度: (ようかいごど) - nursing care level (between 1 and 5 based on assessment of care requirements)
要介護認定: (ようかいごにんてい) - primary nursing care requirement authorization (a 5-level graded system under health insurance)
要件: (ようけん) - important matter; requirement/requisite/necessary condition/sine qua non
要冷蔵: (ようれいぞう) - (oft. on signs) requiring refrigeration
要員: (よういん) - essential member; necessary person; personnel
要塞都市: (ようさいとし) - fortified city; bastide
要害堅固: (ようがいけんご) - (yoji) (a fortress being) impregnable; unassailable
要心: (ようじん) - care; precaution; guarding; caution
要慎: (ようじん) - care; precaution; guarding; caution
要所: (ようしょ) - important point; important position
要所要所: (ようしょようしょ) - (yoji) every important point
要援護: (ようえんご) - requiring special help (usu. seniors, infants, etc. in disaster scenarios)
要援護者: (ようえんごしゃ) - person requiring special help (usu. seniors, infants, etc. in disaster scenarios)
要撃戦闘機: (ようげきせんとうき) - fighter interceptor
要求: (youkyuu) - demanda, pedido firme, requisição, requisito, desejo
要求にかなう: (ようきゅうにかなう) - to meet (one's) demands
要求に添う: (ようきゅうにそう) - to meet (one's) demands
要求に適う: (ようきゅうにかなう) - to meet (one's) demands
要求モード: (ようきゅうモード) - request mode
要求側: (ようきゅうがわ) - requester; requesting SS user
要求側アソシエーション制御プロトコル機械: (ようきゅうがわアソシエーションせいぎょプロトコルきかい) - requesting Association Control Protocol Machine
要求側遠隔操作プロトコル機械: (ようきゅうがわえんかくそうさプロトコルきかい) - requesting-remote-operation-protocol-machine
要求側ＳＳ利用者: (ようきゅうがわエスエスりようしゃ) - requester; requesting SS user
要求分析: (ようきゅうぶんせき) - requirements analysis
要求分解: (ようきゅうぶんかい) - request decomposition
要求払い預金: (ようきゅうはらいよきん) - demand deposit
要求時ページング: (ようきゅうじページング) - on-demand paging
要求書: (ようきゅうしょ) - written request; requisition
要求送信: (ようきゅうそうしん) - send a request
要求配信方法: (ようきゅうはいしんほうほう) - requested preferred delivery method
要治療: (ようちりょう) - requiring medical treatment
